Text:
What a piece of sh*t movie! I can't believe any producer would keep on publishing Stephen King crap. This movie (part1 and part2) is the EXACT same bullshit Stephen King has been putting out since the day he started writing! Boring, not scary nonsensical drama. Then you get to the end, FINALLY, and pray to God that Stephen King dies a slow horrible death! That would make a better movie!

A- 10
V- 10
M-  negative 26
